BR_text.BRsummary: Documentation adaptation to Visual Studio 2015 referent to Instalation
BR_text.BRdescription:
In Visual Studio 2015, the Property Manager that was in View/Property Manager now is in . Then, the documentation in <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/introduction/windows_visual_studio_Opencv/windows_visual_studio_Opencv.html#windows-visual-studio-how-to>How to build applications with OpenCV inside the Microsoft Visual Studio</denchmark-link>
  should change.
